text: “(mema nabivaraya veta kavurun kumak pævasuvada, eyata) savan denneku vasayen ohu sitinneya” yi pavasa, (apage) nabivarayava vedana gena dennanda ovungen bohomadeneku sitinnaha. (eyata nabiye!) oba mese kiyanu: “(ese ohu) savan dima obatama hondaya. ohu allahvada, visvasa karanneya. visvasavantayinvada visvasa karanneya. tavada obagen visvasaya tæbuvan kerehi itamat dayabaravada sitinneya”. ebævin (obagen) kavurun (mese pavasa) allahge dutayava vedana gena denneda, ovunta itamat vedana gena dena danduvam æta
